==> ./.git/config <==
[core]
	repositoryformatversion = 0
	filemode = true
	bare = false
	logallrefupdates = true

==> ./config <==
# This file has been auto-generated by i3-config-wizard(1).
# It will not be overwritten, so edit it as you like.
#
# Should you change your keyboard layout some time, delete
# this file and re-run i3-config-wizard(1).
#

# i3 config file (v4)
#
# Please see https://i3wm.org/docs/userguide.html for a complete reference!

set $mod Mod4

# Font for window titles. Will also be used by the bar unless a different font
# is used in the # bar {} block below.
font pango:monospace 8

# This font is widely installed, provides lots of unicode glyphs, right-to-left
# text rendering and scalability on retina/hidpi displays (thanks to pango).
#font pango:DejaVu Sans Mono 8

# Start XDG autostart .desktop files using dex. See also
# https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/XDG_Autostart
exec --no-startup-id dex --autostart --environment i3

# The combination of xss-lock, nm-applet and pactl is a popular choice, so
# they are included here as an example. Modify as you see fit.

# xss-lock grabs a logind suspend inhibit lock and will use i3lock to lock the
# screen before suspend. Use loginctl lock-session to lock your screen.
exec --no-startup-id xss-lock --transfer-sleep-lock -- i3lock --nofork

# NetworkManager is the most popular way to manage wireless networks on Linux,
# and nm-applet is a desktop environment-independent system tray GUI for it.
exec --no-startup-id nm-applet

# Use pactl to adjust volume in PulseAudio.
set $refresh_i3status killall -SIGUSR1 i3status

# Use Mouse+$mod to drag floating windows to their wanted position
floating_modifier $mod

# move tiling windows via drag & drop by left-clicking into the title bar,
# or left-clicking anywhere into the window while holding the floating modifier.
tiling_drag modifier titlebar

# start a terminal

# kill focused window

# start dmenu (a program launcher)
# COMMENTED_BY_SCRIPT bindsym $mod+d exec --no-startup-id dmenu_run
# A more modern dmenu replacement is rofi:
# bindcode $mod+40 exec "rofi -modi drun,run -show drun"
# There also is i3-dmenu-desktop which only displays applications shipping a
# .desktop file. It is a wrapper around dmenu, so you need that installed.
# bindcode $mod+40 exec --no-startup-id i3-dmenu-desktop

# change focus
bindsym $mod+j focus left
bindsym $mod+k focus down
bindsym $mod+semicolon focus right

# alternatively, you can use the cursor keys:
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT focus left
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT focus down
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT focus up
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT focus right

# move focused window
bindsym $mod+Shift+j move left
bindsym $mod+Shift+k move down
bindsym $mod+Shift+l move up
bindsym $mod+Shift+semicolon move right

# alternatively, you can use the cursor keys:
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT move left
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT move down
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT move up
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT move right

# split in horizontal orientation
bindsym $mod+h split h

# split in vertical orientation
bindsym $mod+v split v

# enter fullscreen mode for the focused container

# change container layout (stacked, tabbed, toggle split)
bindsym $mod+s layout stacking
# REPLACED_BY_SCRIPT bindsym $mod+w layout tabbed
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT layout toggle split

# toggle tiling / floating

# change focus between tiling / floating windows
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT focus mode_toggle

# focus the parent container
bindsym $mod+a focus parent

# focus the child container
#bindsym $mod+d focus child

# Define names for default workspaces for which we configure key bindings later on.
# We use variables to avoid repeating the names in multiple places.
set $ws1 "1"
set $ws2 "2"
set $ws3 "3"
set $ws4 "4"
set $ws5 "5"
set $ws6 "6"
set $ws7 "7"
set $ws8 "8"
set $ws9 "9"
set $ws10 "10"

# switch to workspace
bindsym $mod+1 workspace number $ws1
bindsym $mod+2 workspace number $ws2
bindsym $mod+3 workspace number $ws3
bindsym $mod+4 workspace number $ws4
bindsym $mod+5 workspace number $ws5
bindsym $mod+6 workspace number $ws6
bindsym $mod+7 workspace number $ws7
bindsym $mod+8 workspace number $ws8
bindsym $mod+9 workspace number $ws9
bindsym $mod+0 workspace number $ws10

# move focused container to workspace
bindsym $mod+Shift+1 move container to workspace number $ws1
bindsym $mod+Shift+2 move container to workspace number $ws2
bindsym $mod+Shift+3 move container to workspace number $ws3
bindsym $mod+Shift+4 move container to workspace number $ws4
bindsym $mod+Shift+5 move container to workspace number $ws5
bindsym $mod+Shift+6 move container to workspace number $ws6
bindsym $mod+Shift+7 move container to workspace number $ws7
bindsym $mod+Shift+8 move container to workspace number $ws8
bindsym $mod+Shift+9 move container to workspace number $ws9
bindsym $mod+Shift+0 move container to workspace number $ws10

# reload the configuration file
bindsym $mod+Shift+c reload
# restart i3 inplace (preserves your layout/session, can be used to upgrade i3)
bindsym $mod+Shift+r restart
# exit i3 (logs you out of your X session)
# REPLACED_BY_SCRIPT (QuickSettings)

# resize window (you can also use the mouse for that)
mode "resize" {
        # These bindings trigger as soon as you enter the resize mode

        # Pressing left will shrink the windowâ€™s width.
        # Pressing right will grow the windowâ€™s width.
        # Pressing up will shrink the windowâ€™s height.
        # Pressing down will grow the windowâ€™s height.
        bindsym j resize shrink width 10 px or 10 ppt
        bindsym k resize grow height 10 px or 10 ppt
        bindsym l resize shrink height 10 px or 10 ppt
        bindsym semicolon resize grow width 10 px or 10 ppt

        # same bindings, but for the arrow keys
        bindsym Left resize shrink width 10 px or 10 ppt
        bindsym Down resize grow height 10 px or 10 ppt
        bindsym Up resize shrink height 10 px or 10 ppt
        bindsym Right resize grow width 10 px or 10 ppt

        # back to normal: Enter or Escape or $mod+r
        bindsym Return mode "default"
        bindsym Escape mode "default"
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT mode "default"
}
# REMOVED_BY_SCRIPT mode "resize"

# Start i3bar to display a workspace bar (plus the system information i3status
# finds out, if available)
# bar {
#         
# }

# --- Autostart Section ---

# 1. Wallpaper (Use a real path to an image you have!)
exec_always --no-startup-id feh --bg-fill ~/Pictures/wallpapers/your_wallpaper.jpg

# 2. Compositor (Enable Transparency & Fading)
exec_always --no-startup-id killall -q picom; sleep 1; picom -b

# 3. Network Manager Applet
exec --no-startup-id nm-applet

# 4. Polkit (Authentication agent)
exec --no-startup-id /usr/lib/policykit-1-gnome/polkit-gnome-authentication-agent-1

exec_always --no-startup-id ~/.config/polybar/launch.sh

# Use Rofi instead of dmenu

# Rofi (Added by script)

# --- Tools (Added by script) ---
bindsym Print exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/screenshot.sh full
bindsym $mod+Shift+s exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/screenshot.sh area
bindsym Shift+Print exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/screenshot.sh area
bindsym $mod+l exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/lock.sh


# --- Hyprland-Style Keybinds (Added by script) ---
bindsym $mod+Return exec kitty
bindsym $mod+q kill
bindsym $mod+e exec thunar
bindsym $mod+f fullscreen toggle
bindsym $mod+space floating toggle
bindsym $mod+r mode "resize"

# Focus (Arrow Keys)
bindsym $mod+Left focus left
bindsym $mod+Down focus down
bindsym $mod+Up focus up
bindsym $mod+Right focus right

# Move Window (Shift + Arrow Keys)
bindsym $mod+Shift+Left move left
bindsym $mod+Shift+Down move down
bindsym $mod+Shift+Up move up
bindsym $mod+Shift+Right move right

# --- Window Rules (Ported from Hyprland) ---

# Floating Windows
for_window [class="Pavucontrol"] floating enable, resize set 800 600, move position center
for_window [class="^.*Calculator$"] floating enable
for_window [class="nm-connection-editor"] floating enable
for_window [class="blueman-manager"] floating enable
for_window [class="nwg-look"] floating enable
for_window [class="qt5ct"] floating enable
for_window [class="qt6ct"] floating enable
for_window [title="Picture-in-Picture"] floating enable, sticky enable
for_window [class="Thunar" title="File Operation Progress"] floating enable

# Dialogs
for_window [window_role="pop-up"] floating enable
for_window [window_role="bubble"] floating enable
for_window [window_role="task_dialog"] floating enable
for_window [window_role="preferences"] floating enable
for_window [window_type="dialog"] floating enable
for_window [window_type="menu"] floating enable

# Center specific windows
for_window [class="Pavucontrol"] move position center
exec_always --no-startup-id ~/.config/i3/scripts/rainbow_borders.sh

# --- Extras (Added by script) ---
bindsym $mod+Shift+g exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/gamemode.sh
# REPLACED_BY_SCRIPT bindsym $mod+w exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/wallpaper_select.sh

# --- Final Extras ---
bindsym Control+Mod1+p exec /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/power_menu.sh
bindsym $mod+Shift+h exec /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/keyhints.sh

# --- Clipboard (Added by script) ---
# Start daemon
exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.local/bin/greenclip daemon
# Bind key (Super + Alt + V matches your Hyprland reference)

# --- Final Setup Additions ---
bindsym XF86AudioRaiseVolume exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/volume.sh up
bindsym XF86AudioLowerVolume exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/volume.sh down
bindsym XF86AudioMute exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/volume.sh mute
bindsym XF86MonBrightnessUp exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/brightness.sh up
bindsym XF86MonBrightnessDown exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/brightness.sh down
bindsym $mod+Mod1+v exec --no-startup-id rofi -modi "clipboard:/home/jimitchavda/.local/bin/greenclip print" -show clipboard -run-command '{cmd}'
bindsym $mod+period exec --no-startup-id rofimoji
bindsym $mod+c exec rofi -show calc -modi calc -no-show-match -no-sort

# --- RofiBeats & Settings ---
bindsym $mod+Shift+m exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/rofibeats.sh
bindsym $mod+Shift+e exec --no-startup-id /home/jimitchavda/.config/i3/scripts/quick_settings.sh

==> ./scripts/wallpaper_select.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
# Wallpaper Selector
WALL_DIR="$HOME/Pictures/wallpapers"
CACHE_DIR="$HOME/.cache/i3"
mkdir -p "$CACHE_DIR"

if [ ! -d "$WALL_DIR" ]; then
    mkdir -p "$WALL_DIR"
    notify-send "Error" "Wallpaper directory not found. Created $WALL_DIR"
    exit 1
fi

# Select wallpaper using Rofi
SELECTED=$(find "$WALL_DIR" -type f \( -iname "*.jpg" -o -iname "*.png" -o -iname "*.jpeg" \) -printf "%f\n" | rofi -dmenu -i -p "Wallpaper")

if [ -n "$SELECTED" ]; then
    FULL_PATH="$WALL_DIR/$SELECTED"
    
    # Apply with feh
    feh --bg-fill "$FULL_PATH"
    
    # Save for persistence (update i3 config autostart is hard, so we use a state file)
    echo "feh --bg-fill '$FULL_PATH'" > "$CACHE_DIR/wallpaper_restore.sh"
    chmod +x "$CACHE_DIR/wallpaper_restore.sh"
    
    notify-send "Wallpaper" "Set to $SELECTED"
fi

==> ./scripts/gamemode.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
# Game Mode: Toggle Compositor (Picom)
if pgrep -x "picom" > /dev/null; then
    killall picom
    notify-send "Game Mode" "Enabled (Animations/Blur OFF)"
else
    picom -b
    notify-send "Game Mode" "Disabled (Animations/Blur ON)"
fi

==> ./scripts/brightness.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
# Usage: ./brightness.sh [up|down]

# 1. Find the first valid backlight device (ignoring keyboard leds)
DEVICE=$(brightnessctl -l | grep -m1 "backlight" | awk -F"'" '{print $2}')

# Fallback if detection fails
if [ -z "$DEVICE" ]; then
    DEVICE=$(ls /sys/class/backlight | head -n 1)
fi

# 2. Change Brightness
case $1 in
    up)
        brightnessctl -d "$DEVICE" set +5%
        ;;
    down)
        brightnessctl -d "$DEVICE" set 5%-
        ;;
esac

# 3. Get new value
BRIGHT=$(brightnessctl -d "$DEVICE" -m | cut -d, -f4 | tr -d %)

# 4. Icon (Use explicit path if available, else generic name)
ICON="/home/jimitchavda/.icons/Flat-Remix-Blue-Dark/symbolic/status/display-brightness-symbolic.svg"
if [ ! -f "$ICON" ]; then
    ICON="display-brightness-symbolic"
fi

# 5. Notify
notify-send -h string:x-canonical-private-synchronous:bri \
    -h int:value:$BRIGHT \
    -i "$ICON" \
    "Brightness: $BRIGHT%"

==> ./scripts/screenshot.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
DIR="$HOME/Pictures/Screenshots"
mkdir -p "$DIR"
NAME="Screenshot_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).png"

if [ "$1" == "area" ]; then
    # Select area, save to file, and copy to clipboard
    maim -s -u | tee "$DIR/$NAME" | xclip -selection clipboard -t image/png
    notify-send "Screenshot" "Area saved and copied."
else
    # Full screen, save to file, and copy to clipboard
    maim -u | tee "$DIR/$NAME" | xclip -selection clipboard -t image/png
    notify-send "Screenshot" "Fullscreen saved and copied."
fi

==> ./scripts/quick_settings.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
# Quick Settings Menu

# Status Checks
WIFI_STAT=$(nmcli radio wifi | grep -q "enabled" && echo "ON" || echo "OFF")
BT_STAT=$(rfkill list bluetooth | grep -q "Soft blocked: yes" && echo "OFF" || echo "ON")

OPTIONS="ðŸ“¶ Wifi ($WIFI_STAT)
ðŸ¦· Bluetooth ($BT_STAT)
ðŸ”Š Audio Mixer
ðŸ’» Edit Config
ðŸ”„ Reload i3
ðŸšª Logout Menu"

CHOICE=$(echo "$OPTIONS" | rofi -dmenu -p "Settings" -i)

case "$CHOICE" in
    *"Wifi"*)
        nmcli radio wifi toggle
        notify-send "Wifi" "Toggled"
        ;;
    *"Bluetooth"*)
        if [ "$BT_STAT" == "ON" ]; then
            rfkill block bluetooth
            notify-send "Bluetooth" "Turned OFF"
        else
            rfkill unblock bluetooth
            notify-send "Bluetooth" "Turned ON"
        fi
        ;;
    *"Audio"*)
        pavucontrol &
        ;;
    *"Edit Config"*)
        kitty -e nvim ~/.config/i3/config &
        ;;
    *"Reload"*)
        i3-msg reload
        ;;
    *"Logout"*)
        ~/.config/i3/scripts/power_menu.sh
        ;;
esac

==> ./scripts/lock.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
IMG="/tmp/i3lock.png"
# Take screenshot
maim "$IMG"
# Blur it (requires imagemagick)
convert "$IMG" -blur 0x5 "$IMG"
# Lock screen with the blurred image
i3lock -i "$IMG"

==> ./scripts/volume.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
# Usage: ./volume.sh [up|down|mute]
function get_vol {
    pactl get-sink-volume @DEFAULT_SINK@ | head -n1 | cut -d/ -f 2 | tr -d ' %'
}
function get_icon {
    vol=$(get_vol)
    if [ "$(pactl get-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@)" == "Mute: yes" ]; then
        echo "audio-volume-muted"
    elif [ "$vol" -lt 30 ]; then
        echo "audio-volume-low"
    elif [ "$vol" -lt 70 ]; then
        echo "audio-volume-medium"
    else
        echo "audio-volume-high"
    fi
}
case $1 in
    up) pactl set-sink-volume @DEFAULT_SINK@ +5% ;;
    down) pactl set-sink-volume @DEFAULT_SINK@ -5% ;;
    mute) pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ toggle ;;
esac
notify-send -h string:x-canonical-private-synchronous:vol -h int:value:$(get_vol) -i "$(get_icon)" "Volume: $(get_vol)%"

==> ./scripts/keyhints.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
# Simple Keybind Viewer
awk '/^bindsym/ {
    $1=""; 
    # Remove "exec", "--no-startup-id", etc to make it readable
    gsub(/exec|--no-startup-id/, ""); 
    print $0
}' ~/.config/i3/config |
  sed 's/bindsym //g' |
  rofi -dmenu -i -p "Keybinds" -width 1000

==> ./scripts/rainbow_borders.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
# Rainbow Borders for i3-wm
# Ported from Hyprland scripts

# Check if already running
if pgrep -x "rainbow_borders" >/dev/null; then
  exit 0
fi

# Initial brightness check (simple logic)
# We will just loop through HSV colors converted to Hex

function rainbow_loop() {
  # Simple array of nice colors
  colors=(
    "#ff0000" "#ff4000" "#ff8000" "#ffbf00" "#ffff00" "#bfff00"
    "#80ff00" "#40ff00" "#00ff00" "#00ff40" "#00ff80" "#00ffbf"
    "#00ffff" "#00bfff" "#0080ff" "#0040ff" "#0000ff" "#4000ff"
    "#8000ff" "#bf00ff" "#ff00ff" "#ff00bf" "#ff0080" "#ff0040"
  )

  while true; do
    for color in "${colors[@]}"; do
      # Change the border of the focused window
      i3-msg "client.focused border pixel 3" >/dev/null
      i3-msg "client.focused border normal 3" >/dev/null # Ensure border exists
      i3-msg "client.focused border pixel 3" >/dev/null

      # Set the color for the "focused" client class in i3
      # Format: client.focused <border> <background> <text> <indicator> <child_border>
      i3-msg "client.focused $color $color #ffffff $color $color" >/dev/null

      sleep 0.1
    done
  done
}

rainbow_loop

==> ./scripts/power_menu.sh <==
#!/bin/bash

# Options
shutdown="â» Shutdown"
reboot="ï€¡ Reboot"
lock="ðŸ”’ Lock"
suspend="zzz Suspend"
logout="ï‚‹ Logout"

# Rofi CMD
rofi_cmd() {
  rofi -dmenu \
    -i \
    -p "Power" \
    -theme-str 'window {width: 300px; height: 350px;} listview {lines: 6;}'
}

# Run Rofi
run_rofi() {
  echo -e "$lock\n$suspend\n$logout\n$reboot\n$shutdown" | rofi_cmd
}

# Actions
run_cmd() {
  case $1 in
  "$shutdown")
    systemctl poweroff
    ;;
  "$reboot")
    systemctl reboot
    ;;
  "$lock")
    ~/.config/i3/scripts/lock.sh
    ;;
  "$suspend")
    systemctl suspend
    ;;
  "$logout")
    i3-msg exit
    ;;
  esac
}

run_cmd "$(run_rofi)"

==> ./scripts/rofibeats.sh <==
#!/bin/bash
# RofiBeats - Ported for i3
# Select and play online music streams

# Notification function
notify() {
    notify-send -i "audio-headphones" "RofiBeats" "$1"
}

# Stop music
if [ "$1" == "--stop" ]; then
    pkill mpv
    notify "Music Stopped"
    exit
fi

# Station List (Format: "Name|URL")
STATIONS=(
  "Lofi Girl â˜•|[https://play.streamafrica.net/lofiradio](https://play.streamafrica.net/lofiradio)"
  "Chillhop ðŸ¦|[http://stream.zeno.fm/fyn8eh3h5f8uv](http://stream.zeno.fm/fyn8eh3h5f8uv)"
  "Easy Rock 96.3 ðŸ“»|[https://radio-stations-philippines.com/easy-rock](https://radio-stations-philippines.com/easy-rock)"
  "Wish 107.5 ðŸŽ¤|[https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkrzfEDjeYJnmgMYwCKid4XIFqUKBVWEs](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkrzfEDjeYJnmgMYwCKid4XIFqUKBVWEs)"
  "Relaxing Piano ðŸŽ¹|[https://youtu.be/6H7hXzjFoVU](https://youtu.be/6H7hXzjFoVU)"
  "STOP MUSIC â¹|STOP"
)

# Generate Menu
MENU=""
for s in "${STATIONS[@]}"; do
    KEY="${s%%|*}"
    MENU="${MENU}${KEY}\n"
done

# Show Rofi
CHOICE=$(echo -e "$MENU" | rofi -dmenu -p "Music" -i)

if [ -z "$CHOICE" ]; then exit; fi

if [[ "$CHOICE" == "STOP MUSIC"* ]]; then
    pkill mpv
    notify "Music Stopped"
    exit
fi

# Find URL
URL=""
for s in "${STATIONS[@]}"; do
    KEY="${s%%|*}"
    VAL="${s#*|}"
    if [ "$KEY" == "$CHOICE" ]; then
        URL="$VAL"
        break
    fi
done

# Play
if [ -n "$URL" ]; then
    pkill mpv
    notify "Playing: $CHOICE"
    mpv --no-video "$URL" > /dev/null 2>&1 &
fi
